## ✅ Acceptance Criteria
<!-- What does "fixed" look like? -->

- [ ] Information is accurate and up-to-date
- [ ] Instructions are clear and easy to follow

- [ ] All links are functional
- [ ] Formatting is consistent
- [ ] Content is appropriate for target audience
